query/time.help: Seconds taken to complete a query.

query/bytes.help: Number of bytes returned in query response.

query/node/time.help: Seconds taken to query individual historical/realtime processes.

query/node/ttfb.help: Time to first byte. Seconds elapsed until Broker starts receiving the response from individual historical/realtime processes.

query/node/bytes.help: Number of bytes returned from querying individual historical/realtime processes.

query/node/backpressure.help: Seconds that the channel to this process has spent suspended due to backpressure.

query/intervalChunk/time.help: Only emitted if interval chunking is enabled. Milliseconds required to query an interval chunk. This metric is deprecated and will be removed in the future because interval chunking is deprecated.

query/segment/time.help: Seconds taken to query individual segment. Includes time to page in the segment from disk.

query/wait/time.help: Seconds spent waiting for a segment to be scanned.

segment/scan/pending.help: Number of segments in queue waiting to be scanned.

query/segmentAndCache/time.help: Seconds taken to query individual segment or hit the cache (if it is enabled on the Historical process).

query/cpu/time.help: Seconds of CPU time taken to complete a query

query/interrupted/count.help: Number of queries interrupted due to cancellation or timeout

query/cache/delta/averageBytes.help: Average size of record in bytes

query/cache/total/numEntries.help: Total number of entries in cache

query/cache/total/sizeBytes.help: Total size of cache in bytes.

query/cache/total/averageBytes.help: Total average record size in bytes

ingest/events/thrownAway.help: Number of events rejected because they are outside the windowPeriod.

ingest/events/unparseable.help: Number of events rejected because the events are unparseable.

ingest/events/duplicate.help: Number of events rejected because the events are duplicated.

ingest/events/processed.help: Number of events successfully processed per emission period.

ingest/events/messageGap.help: Time gap in milliseconds between the latest ingested event timestamp and the current system timestamp of metrics emission.

ingest/persists/cpu.help: Cpu time in Seconds spent on doing intermediate persist.

ingest/persists/backPressure.help: Seconds spent creating persist tasks and blocking waiting for them to finish.

ingest/merge/cpu.help: Cpu time in Seconds spent on merging intermediate segments.

ingest/kafka/lag.help: Total lag between the offsets consumed by the Kafka indexing tasks and latest offsets in Kafka brokers across all partitions. Minimum emission period for this metric is a minute.

ingest/kafka/maxLag.help: Max lag between the offsets consumed by the Kafka indexing tasks and latest offsets in Kafka brokers across all partitions. Minimum emission period for this metric is a minute.

ingest/kafka/avgLag.help: Average lag between the offsets consumed by the Kafka indexing tasks and latest offsets in Kafka brokers across all partitions. Minimum emission period for this metric is a minute.

task/success/count.help: Number of successful tasks per emission period. This metric is only available if the TaskCountStatsMonitor module is included.

task/failed/count.help: Number of failed tasks per emission period. This metric is only available if the TaskCountStatsMonitor module is included.

task/running/count.help: Number of current running tasks. This metric is only available if the TaskCountStatsMonitor module is included.

task/pending/count.help: Number of current pending tasks. This metric is only available if the TaskCountStatsMonitor module is included.

task/waiting/count.help: Number of current waiting tasks. This metric is only available if the TaskCountStatsMonitor module is included.

task/run/time.help: Milliseconds taken to run a task.

segment/added/bytes.help: Size in bytes of new segments created.

segment/moved/bytes.help: Size in bytes of segments moved/archived via the Move Task.

segment/nuked/bytes.help: Size in bytes of segments deleted via the Kill Task.

segment/assigned/count.help: Number of segments assigned to be loaded in the cluster.

segment/moved/count.help: Number of segments moved in the cluster.

segment/dropped/count.help: Number of segments dropped due to being overshadowed.

segment/deleted/count.help: Number of segments dropped due to rules.

segment/unneeded/count.help: Number of segments dropped due to being marked as unused.

segment/unavailable/count.help: Number of segments (not including replicas) left to load until segments that should be loaded in the cluster are available for queries.

segment/underReplicated/count.help: Number of segments (including replicas) left to load until segments that should be loaded in the cluster are available for queries.

segment/cost/raw.help: Used in cost balancing. The raw cost of hosting segments.

segment/cost/normalization.help: Used in cost balancing. The normalization of hosting segments.

segment/cost/normalized.help: Used in cost balancing. The normalized cost of hosting segments.

segment/loadQueue/size.help: Size in bytes of segments to load.

segment/loadQueue/failed.help: Number of segments that failed to load.

segment/size.help: Size in bytes of available segments.

segment/max.help: Maximum byte limit available for segments.

segment/usedPercent.help: Percentage of space used by served segments.

segment/pendingDelete.help: On-disk size in bytes of segments that are waiting to be cleared out

jvm/gc/cpu.help: Count of CPU time in Nanoseconds spent on garbage collection. Note: `jvm/gc/cpu` represents the total time over multiple GC cycles; divide by `jvm/gc/count` to get the mean GC time per cycle.

ingest/events/buffered.help: Number of events queued in the EventReceiverFirehose's buffer

sys/disk/write/size.help: Bytes written to disk. Can we used to determine how much paging is occurring with regards to segments.

sys/disk/read/size.help: Bytes read from disk. Can we used to determine how much paging is occurring with regards to segments.
